property.note: Usually the name as it is presented on the book
May be used to give a well-known pseudonym, where the primary name is a ‘real’ name
May be used to identify a well-known real name, where the primary name is a pseudonym
Use only within <AlternativeName>, when the primary name type is unspecified, for names in a different script or language

name.language: Transliterated / translated form of primary name

property.note: Use only within <NameAsSubject> to indicate the subject is fictional, or in <AlternativeName> alongside <UnnamedPersons> to indicate a human-like name for a synthetic voice or AI. Only for use in ONIX 3.0 or later
